item.description:
Film followed by drinks or a bite to eat.  More details in the email that I sent early Saturday afternoon.

Please sign up only if you will actually attend, so I know how many people to look for.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby, across from the ticket window. I'll send my mobile number to anyone who signs up by 2PM Sunday, in case you have any trouble finding the group.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: The Conquest
